discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
A single DLP rule can have multiple actions. By modifying the existing rule, you can add the new action to disable downloading, printing, and copying, without creating a separate rule.

Selected Answer: B
Agree with B
“You also”. Key word so B is correct

choices.A: Do nothing. View-only Drive files automatically prevent the user from downloading the files.
choices.B: Modify the existing DLP rule to Disable download, print, and copy for commenters and viewers.
choices.C: Create a new DLP rule by using the existing content detector conditions, but change the action for the new rule to Disable download, print, and copy for commenters and viewers.
choices.D: Create a new DLP rule and set the scope to the organizational unit or group that you want to restrict.

questions.question_text: Your organization has a data loss prevention (DLP) rule to detect and warn users about external sharing of sensitive files in Google Drive. You also want to prevent external users from downloading files with viewer permissions to their local machines. What should you do?

choices.A: Create a Dynamic Group by using the location condition to keep the distribution list automatically updated based on the employees’ work locations.
choices.B: Create a Security Group and apply the Location label to allow employees to join based on the specified location.
choices.D: Create a Google Group and set permissions to invite employees to join the group.
choices.C: Create a Google Group and add all employees in the Washington DC work location.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
You can create a dynamic group to set policies for everyone at your organization who works in a specific geographic location. As users move and change their location in their user profile, the system automatically adds or removes them from the group.

Selected Answer: A
a Dynamic Group is the best answer

questions.question_text: You work for an organization that is headquartered in Washington DC. You want to reliably send email announcements to all employees in the area and update membership automatically. What should you do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is the only choice.

Selected Answer: B
A content compliance rule allows you to quarantine emails based on specific content (e.g., mentions of the project), ensuring they are not sent outside the organization. Adding the CEO and CFO to an address list that bypasses this rule ensures that they can send project-related information without delay.

Selected Answer: B
Agree with B

questions.question_text: Your organization is working on a confidential project with details that cannot be shared through email with anyone outside your organization. You want to add controls in Gmail that prevent any mention of the project from being sent by employees. Only the CEO and the CFO can send information about the project over email and without a delay. What should you do?

choices.C: Configure a Gmail Content compliance rule for outbound email that quarantines all email mentioning the project. Manually review all quarantined emails and choose to deliver the ones sent by the CEO and CFO.
choices.A: Configure the Gmail Restrict delivery setting, and add an allowlist with all domains that your employees are allowed to send emails to. Include the CEO and CFO email addresses to the allowlist.
choices.D: Configure the Gmail Restrict delivery setting for all outgoing messages, except the internal emails. Add the CEO and CFO email addresses to the allowlist.
choices.B: Configure a Gmail Content compliance rule for outbound email that quarantines all email mentioning the project. Bypass the rule by using the address list with the CEO and CFO email addresses.

choices.A: Use the Security Investigation Tool with Voice Log Events as the data source field. In the search operator fields, select Event, is, and Network Statistics (client). Analyze the packet loss.
choices.D: Verify if there is a service interruption for Google Voice reported on the Google Workspace Updates Blog website.
choices.B: Verify if there is a service outage for Google Voice reported on the Google Workspace Status Dashboard.
choices.C: Use the Security Investigation Tool with User Log Events as the data source field. In the search operator fields, select Event, is, and Call failed. Analyze the packet loss.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Google Workspace Status Dashboard provides a comprehensive view of any ongoing service disruptions, which is crucial for distinguishing between organizational and global issues.

Selected Answer: B
Agree it is B

questions.question_text: Users at your organization are reporting issues with Google Voice including disconnected calls and overall connection issues. You want to identify whether these issues affect just your organization or whether it's a global Google issue. What should you do?

You have enrolled a new Google Meet hardware device for an existing conference room in your building. Your users report that the new hardware in the conference does not show the expected calendar events. You need to investigate and fix the problem. What should you do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The calendar that the event is associated with must be added on the Google Meet hardware device.

Selected Answer: A
It is A
 Make sure that the conference room resource calendar has been created and that the Meet Hardware is associated with that resource.

choices.A: Make sure that the conference room resource calendar has been created and that the Meet Hardware is associated with that resource.
choices.C: Use the Meet Quality Tool in the control panel to search for the newly installed Meet Hardware.
choices.B: Create a brand new resource calendar and associate the Meet Hardware with that new resource.
choices.D: Make sure the Access permissions for the resource calendar is set to “See all event details”.
